remarks: Founded Induction Schema.  If a property passes from all elements less than ` y ` of a founded class ` A ` to ` y ` itself (induction hypothesis), then the property holds for all elements of ` A ` . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 7-Feb-2011.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jun-2015.)
statement:
frinsg.1 $e |- ( y e. A -> ( A. z e. Pred ( R , A , y ) [. z / y ]. ph -> ph ) ) $.
frinsg $p |- ( ( R Fr A /\ R Se A ) -> A. y e. A ph ) $.
$d A y z $.
$d R y z $.
$d ph z $.
